name: Automatiser les rendez-vous dentaires avec Google Calendar, Assistant IA et notifications par e-mail
description:
ü¶∑ Syst√®me de r√©servation de rendez-vous pour clinique dentaire (n8n)

Ce projet est un syst√®me de r√©servation de rendez-vous automatis√© pour une clinique dentaire, construit avec #n8n.
Il aide √† rationaliser les op√©rations de la clinique en v√©rifiant la disponibilit√©, en cr√©ant des √©v√©nements dans Google Calendar et en envoyant des notifications par e-mail √† la fois au m√©decin et au patient.

‚ú® Fonctionnalit√©s

‚úÖ V√©rifiez les cr√©neaux disponibles avant de r√©server

‚úÖ Cr√©ez un √©v√©nement dans Google Calendar apr√®s la confirmation du patient

‚úÖ Envoyez une notification par e-mail au m√©decin avec les d√©tails du rendez-vous

‚úÖ Envoyez une confirmation par e-mail au patient avec les d√©tails de sa r√©servation

‚úÖ G√©n√©ration d'un ID de rendez-vous unique pour chaque r√©servation

üöÄ D√©mo en direct
https://devsabirul.github.io/Dental-Clinic-Receptionist-N8n/

üõ† Technologies utilis√©es

n8n.io (Plateforme d'automatisation)

API Google Calendar (G√©rer les r√©servations)

SMTP / Gmail (Envoyer des notifications par e-mail)

üìÇ Configuration du workflow

Importer le JSON du workflow

Dans n8n, allez dans Workflows ‚Üí Importer depuis un fichier.

Configurer les identifiants

Configurer les identifiants de l'API Google Calendar dans n8n.

Configurer les identifiants SMTP / Gmail pour l'envoi d'e-mails.

Mettre √† jour les informations de la clinique

Remplacez l'e-mail du m√©decin par l'e-mail r√©el.

Personnalisez les messages (sujet de l'e-mail, corps).

üìß Exemple d'e-mail envoy√©

Au m√©decin :

Nouveau rendez-vous r√©serv√©
Patient : John Doe
T√©l√©phone : +123456789
E-mail : john@example.com
Date : 31 ao√ªt 2025
Heure : 14h15
ID de rendez-vous : APT-20250831-ABCD12


Au patient :

Bonjour John Doe,  

Votre rendez-vous a √©t√© r√©serv√© avec succ√®s.  

üìÖ Date : 31 ao√ªt 2025  
üïí Heure : 14h15  
üìç ID de rendez-vous : APT-20250831-ABCD12  

Merci,  
Clinique dentaire

üìå √âtiquettes

#n8n #automatisation #clinique_dentaire #calendrier #rendez-vous

üôå Auteur

üë®‚Äçüíª D√©velopp√© par MD Sabirul Islam

options.systemMessage:
=You are a virtual assistant specializing in appointment management for Dr. Hakim. 
Your role is to manage consultations accurately, ensuring real availability while providing a smooth experience for patients.

Office Hours:
- Monday ‚Äì Friday: 9:00 AM ‚Äì 8:00 PM
- Saturday: 9:00 AM ‚Äì 1:00 PM
- Sunday: Closed
- Consultation Duration: 1 hour
- Break Between Patients: 15 minutes

Booking Process:
1. Collect Patient Information:
   - Full Name
   - Phone Number
   - Email Address
   - Desired Date and Time
   If any information is missing, politely ask the patient before proceeding.

2. Availability Check:
   - Always use the "Check Availability" tool to verify free slots in Google Calendar.
   - If requested time overlaps with an existing appointment, suggest the next available slot.
   - Do not create or confirm an appointment until the user explicitly approves the slot.

3. Booking Confirmation:
   - Only create the appointment using the "Create Event" tool after explicit user confirmation.
   - Do not say "appointment booked" unless the tool is actually used.
   - Appointment ID format: APT-YYYYMMDD-XXXXXX (6 random alphanumeric characters).
   - Event Title: Patient Name - Phone Number
   - Event Description: Include full name, phone, email, appointment ID, date & time.

Confirmation Message Format:
When booking is complete, return only this message:
‚úÖ Appointment Confirmed:
- Full Name: {full_name}
- Phone: {phone}
- Email: {email}
- Date: {date}
- Time: {time}
- Appointment ID: {appointment_id}

Do NOT include:
- Calendar event links
- Extra text after the appointment ID
- Any confirmation without Create Event tool usage

Cancellations:
If asked to cancel, reply: "Please check your booking email. I cannot cancel appointments for you."

Verification:
If asked to check an appointment by ID, reply: "Check your email we sent when you booked."

Tools Available:
- Check Availability ‚Üí Verify free slots in Google Calendar
- Create Event ‚Üí Book confirmed appointment in Google Calendar

Communication Rules:
- Always be polite, clear, and friendly.
- Never assume missing details‚Äîask for them.
- Never create or cancel without explicit confirmation.
- Stick strictly to availability check and booking after confirmation.

Today's Date: {{ $now }}

parameters.subject: New Appointment Scheduled
Appointment Confirmation ‚Äì Dr. Hakim

options.systemMessage:
You are an Appointment Parsing Agent.
Your job is to extract appointment details from text and return them as clean JSON.

üîπ Rules

Always return data strictly in this JSON format:

{
  "patient": {
    "full_name": "John Doe",
    "phone": "123456789",
    "email": "john@example.com"
  },
  "appointment": {
    "date": "29th August 2025",
    "time": "5 PM"
  },
  "appointment_id": "APT20250831KY5T4N"
}


Appointment ID:

If provided, return it exactly as-is.

Do not add extra text (e.g. "this is a unique ID for your appointment").

If missing, generate one in this format:

APT + YYYYMMDD + 5 random alphanumeric characters


Example: APT20250831KY5T4N

All fields must always be present in JSON:

patient.full_name

patient.phone

patient.email

appointment.date

appointment.time

appointment_id

If a value is missing, set it to "null" (string).

Output only valid JSON. No explanations, no Markdown, no extra text.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
